title: BRIEF-CIMIC Group Gets New Inner City South State Secondary College Project
text:
BRIEF-CIMIC Group Gets New Inner City South State Secondary College Project

Stock Markets 44 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 19:35)

© Reuters. BRIEF-CIMIC Group Gets New Inner City South State Secondary College Project Oct 17 (Reuters) - CIMIC Group Ltd : * SELECTED BY QUEENSLAND GOVERNMENT TO DELIVER STAGES 1 AND 2 OF NEW INNER CITY SOUTH STATE SECONDARY COLLEGE IN DUTTON PARK * PROJECT WILL GENERATE REVENUE OF ABOUT $110 MILLION TO CIMIC GROUP * WORK SCHEDULED TO COMMENCE IN 2019, COMPLETED IN 2021

BRIEF-CIMIC Group Gets New Inner City South State Secondary College Project
description: BRIEF-CIMIC Group Gets New Inner City South State Secondary College Project
